name: SPECTMPI
title: SPECT MPI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with SPECT MPI.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with SPECT MPI.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with SPECT MPI are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with SPECT MPI are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)

concept.display: Myocardial perfusion imaging; tomographic (SPECT), single study (including attenuation correction when performed), at rest or stress (exercise and/or pharmacologic), with or without quantification

Myocardial perfusion imaging; tomographic (SPECT), multiple studies (including attenuation correction when performed), at rest and/or stress (exercise and/or pharmacologic) and redistribution and/or rest injection, with or without quantification
